entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
